mapper.select: SELECT g.*,ig.interact_id,ig.user_day_number,ig.type FROM inno72_interact_goods ig LEFT JOIN inno72_goods g ON g.id = ig.goods_id WHERE ig.type =0 and ig.goods_id = #{id}

SELECT c.*,c.shops_id AS shop_id,s.seller_id,ig.interact_id,ig.user_day_number,ig.type FROM inno72_interact_goods ig LEFT JOIN inno72_coupon c ON c.id = ig.goods_id LEFT JOIN inno72_shops s ON s.id = c.shops_id WHERE ig.type =1 and ig.goods_id = #{id}

SELECT g.id,g.`code`,g.`name`,s.shop_name AS shop_name,m.merchant_name AS merchant_name,ig.user_day_number,ig.type FROM inno72_interact_goods ig LEFT JOIN inno72_goods g ON g.id = ig.goods_id LEFT JOIN inno72_shops s ON s.id = g.shop_id LEFT JOIN inno72_merchant m ON m.id = g.seller_id WHERE ig.type =0 AND g.id is not null and ig.interact_id = #{interactId} and g.shop_id = #{shopsId} UNION SELECT c.id,c.`code`,CONCAT(c.`name`,'（券）') AS name ,s.shop_name AS shop_name,m.merchant_name AS merchant_name,ig.user_day_number,ig.type FROM inno72_interact_goods ig LEFT JOIN inno72_coupon c ON c.id = ig.goods_id LEFT JOIN inno72_shops s ON s.id = c.shops_id LEFT JOIN inno72_merchant m ON m.id = s.seller_id WHERE ig.type =1 AND c.id is not null and ig.interact_id = #{interactId} and c.shops_id = #{shopsId}

SELECT ig.goods_id AS id, g.`name` AS name, IF(LENGTH(ig.coupon)>1,1,0) AS isCheck, IFNULL(ig.coupon,"") couponId FROM inno72_interact_goods ig LEFT JOIN inno72_goods g ON g.id=ig.goods_id WHERE ig.type=0 and ig.interact_id = #{interactId} and g.shop_id = #{shopsId}
